data.title: Eminem to reunite with ex Kim Mathers at daughter Hailie Jade‚Äôs wedding
data.meta_description: Kim Mathers confirmed she will attend her daughter Hailie Jade's wedding to Evan McClintock and reunite with her ex Eminem.
data.text:
Kim Mathers revealed she will reunite with her ex-husband Eminem at their daughter Hailie Jade‚Äôs upcoming wedding to Evan McClintock following years of feuding.

Mathers confirmed to The US Sun that she will ‚Äúof course‚Äù be in attendance at the highly anticipated nuptials and gave insight into their repaired relationship.

‚ÄúNot often, but often enough!‚Äù she said when asked how frequently she sees the influencer and her other children.

Mathers, 48, also shared that her sister‚Äôs daughter Alaina Scott, whom Eminem adopted in the early 2000s, had an ‚Äúextravagant‚Äù wedding to Matt Moeller.

Following the ‚Äú‚ÄòGreat Gatsby‚Äô glam‚Äù-themed soiree, Alaina, 30, dished that the ‚ÄúLose Yourself‚Äù rapper walked her down the aisle.

‚ÄúHe wasn‚Äôt going to miss that,‚Äù she added, noting that Hailie, 27, served as her maid of honor.

Hailie announced her and McClintock‚Äôs engagement in February by sharing photos of her longtime beau down on one knee holding the ring box.

‚Äúcasual weekend recap‚Ä¶ üò≠üíó 2.4.23 üíç,‚Äù Mathers captioned photos on Instagram.

‚Äúi love you @evanmcclintock11,‚Äù she added.

The loved-up pair celebrated their engagement with a blowout bash in Detroit in May. The bride-to-be wore numerous looks throughout the evening, starting with a halter-top white dress before changing into a black top and dark pants, and another look that featured sparkling pants, a feathered white jacket and a bandeau top.

The ‚ÄúReal Slim Shady‚Äù performer, 50, and Mathers met at a house party in 1988 when he was 15 years old and she was 13 when she had just gotten out of a youth home after she and her sister escaped their father‚Äôs abuse.

Mathers moved into Eminem‚Äôs house with his mom, Debbie Nelson, but when their romance began Nelson kicked them out.

Mathers became pregnant in 1995 and the couple welcomed Hailie on Christmas Day that year. The pair married in 1999 but divorced two years later. They briefly reconciled in 2006 but ultimately split again.

‚ÄúMoney is great, but it doesn‚Äôt make your husband stay at home with you,‚Äù Mathers said in an interview with ‚Äú20/20‚Äù . ‚ÄúOr sleep in the same bed with you ‚Ä¶ Him being on the road and on tour ‚Ä¶ that was like the big one. I mean ‚Ä¶ constant infidelities, all the time.‚Äù

A decade after their split, Eminem apologized to his ex-wife on the track ‚ÄúBad Husband.‚Äù

‚ÄúI loved you / but I hated that me / And I don‚Äôt wanna see that side again / But I‚Äôm sorry, Kim / More than you could ever comprehend,‚Äù he rapped.
